casebody.data:
Oliver P. SERFASS, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. LEHIGH VALLEY RAILROAD COMPANY, Defendant-Appellant. No. 193. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Jan. 19, 1931. Alexander & Green, of New York City (Clifton P. Williamson and Herbert S. Ogdon, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. John C. Robinson, of New York City (Morris A. Wainger, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
